text:
Passport, Inc | Charlotte, NC | Full-time | Onsite

Check out details at passportinc.com for a look at what we do and submit a resume.

We’re looking for full-stack, ios, android devs — people who are comfortable working on all parts of the system. We mostly use php, python, java, and build it on AWS.   At Passport located Charlotte, NC you get to work in a startup culture and not have to live in the Bay Area!

If you are interested in learning more, shoot me an email. brad@passportinc.com
